name: Snake Path
description:
Snake Path will drag you into a cycle of adventures in the spirit of classic arcade games. Collect fruits, avoid obstacles and enemies, grow to a huge size, compete with other players and learn all the secrets of the island!

Features:

  • Classic game in a modern shell
  • Advanced game modes
  • 5 colorful locations
  • Leaderboard
  • Special abilities
  • Mini-bosses
  • Ability to watch a replay of the game and share it with your friends

Game modes:

  • Classic game mode - crawl, collect apples, avoid obstacles and fight mini-bosses, collect keys and unlock new levels
  • Hunger mode - you are a hungry snake, VERY hungry. Collect apples in the allotted time and get a reprieve
  • Competitive mode - a mode for real snake lovers. Show what you can do and tell the world about it in the leaderboard

Locations:

Explore the island and all its biomes, visit the temple of the search for truth, crawl through the jungle, explore the pyramid, avoid an avalanche and try not to get burned in the mouth of a volcano!

Abilities:

Some apples can give you additional abilities, that you can use in critical situations:
  • Invulnerability - use to crawl over an obstacle, dodge a stone or use the ability to fight a mini-boss
  • Increased speed - who said snakes are slow? with this ability, you're making speed like a racing car!
  • Slow down - use it in situations where you need to be extremely careful

Mini-bosses:

Do you want to open a new level? Fight with mini-bosses on the map and prove that you are worthy to learn all the secrets of the island

Replays:

All your gaming experience is saved and you can always look at how you played and reached an incredibly large size - use this feature to share the best moments with your friends

Graphics:

The game is created using CRYENGINE technology, so you can enjoy really beautiful graphics and wonder: "Can this PC launch a snake?!"
